question: find ( 7 x + 4 y ) / ( x - 2 y ) if x / 2 y = 5 / 2 ?
what decimal fraction is 30 ml of a litre ?
a number x is multiplied by 7 , and this product is then divided by 3 . if the positive square root of the result of these two operations equals x , what is the value of x if x ≠ 0 ?

if money is invested at r percent interest , compounded annually , the amount of investment will double in approximately 70 / r years . if pat ' s parents invested $ 5000 in a long term bond that pays 8 percent interest , compounded annually , what will be the approximate total amount of investment 18 years later , when pat is ready for college ?
evaluate : 986 x 237 + 986 x 863
the perimeter of a triangle is 20 cm and the inradius of the triangle is 2.5 cm . what is the area of the triangle
what decimal fraction is 20 ml of a litre ?
a train which has 420 m long , is running 45 kmph . in what time will it cross a person moving at 9 kmph in same direction ?
find the least number which when divided by 20 , 25,35 and 40 leaves remainders 14 , 19,29 and 34 respectively .
david has $ 1,500 at the beginning of his trip , after spending money , he still has exactly $ 500 less than he spent on the trip . how much money does john still have ?
how many positive integers less than 50 have a reminder 01 when divided by 5 ?
a no . when divided by 220 gives a remainder 43 , what remainder will beobtained by dividingthe same no . 17 ?

gary drove from point a to point b at 60 km / h . on his way back he took a train travelling at 110 km / h and therefore his trip back lasted 5 hours less . what is the distance ( in km ) between a and b ?
the length of a bridge in meters , which a train 100 - meters long and traveling at 45 km / hr can cross in 30 seconds is ?
amar takes as much time in running 18 meters as a car takes in covering 48 meters . what will be the distance covered by amar during the time the car covers 1.3 km ?
x can finish a work in 20 days . y can finish the same work in 16 days . y worked for 12 days and left the job . how many days does x alone need to finish the remaining work ?
find the compound interest on $ 100000 in 2 years at 4 % per annum , the interest being compounded half - yearly ?
find the constant k so that : - x 2 - ( k + 12 ) x - 8 = - ( x - 2 ) ( x - 4 )
a is two years older than b who is twice as old as c . if the total of the ages of a , b and c be 37 , the how old is b ?
sandy is younger than molly by 12 years . if their ages are in the respective ratio of 7 : 9 , how old is molly ?

a contractor undertakes to do a job within 100 days and hires 10 people to do it . after 20 days , he realizes that one fourth of the work is done so he fires 2 people . in how many more days m will the work get over ?
a bus covered a distance of 250 km , partly at an average speed of 40 kmph and partly at 60 kmph . if the total time taken is 5.5 hours , then the distance covered at 40 kmph is
a cistern which could be filled in 6 hours takes one hour more to be filled owing to a leak in its bottom . if the cistern is full in what time will the leak empty it ?
when a certain perfect square is increased by 148 , the result is another perfect square . what is the value of the original perfect square ?

a new tower has just been built at the verbico military hospital ; the number of beds available for patients at the hospital is now 6 times the number available before the new tower was built . currently , 1 / 3 of the hospital ' s original beds , as well as 1 / 5 of the beds in the new tower , are occupied . for the purposes of renovating the hospital ' s original wing , all of the patients in the hospital ' s original beds must be transferred to beds in the new tower . if patients are neither admitted nor discharged during the transfer , what fraction of the beds in the new tower will be unoccupied once the transfer is complete ?
if d = 1 / ( 2 ^ 3 * 5 ^ 8 ) is expressed as a terminating decimal , how many nonzero digits will d have ?

an engineer undertakes a project to build a road 15 km long in 300 days and employs 35 men for the purpose . after 100 days , he finds only 2.5 km of the road has been completed . find the ( approximate ) number of extra men he must employ to finish the work in time .
fresh grapes contain 75 % by weight while dried grapes contain 25 % water by weight . what is the weight of dry grapes available from 200 kg of fresh grapes ?
robin ' s average ( arithmetic mean ) test score on 9 tests is 82 . what must be robin ' s score on a 10 th test for his average score on the 10 tests to be 83 ?
a man invests some money partly in 4 % stock at 48 and partly in 10 % stock at 110 . to obtain equal dividends from both , he must invest the money in the ratio :
when y is divided by 288 , the remainder is 45 . what is the remainder when the same y is divided by 24 ?

a cube is divided into 343 identical cubelets . each cut is made parallel to some surface of the cube . but before doing that , the cube is painted with green on one set of opposite faces , red on another set of opposite faces , and blue on the third set of opposite faces . how many cubelets are painted with exactly one colour ?

in a graduate physics course , 60 percent of the students are male and 30 percent of the students are married . if two - sevenths of the male students are married , what fraction of the female students is single ?
a car travels first 160 km at 70 km / hr and the next 160 km at 80 km / hr . what is the average speed for the first 320 km of the tour ?
the average weight of 4 pigs is 15 kg . weight less than 16 kg is considered as under weight . what maximum no . of pig can be under weight .
indu gave bindu rs . 2500 on compound interest for 2 years at 4 % per annum . how much loss would indu has suffered had she given it to bindu for 2 years at 2 % per annum simple interest ?
find the principal which yields a simple interest of rs . 20 and compound interest of rs . 24 in two years , at the same percent rate per annum ?
220 % of a number x is 44 . what is 44 % of x .

3 friends are planning to attend a concert . if another friend also goes with them , they will get a group discount on their tickets . if the new total price of the tickets with the group discount is the same as the original total price of the tickets without the group discount , how much is the discount ?

a mathematics teacher tabulated the marks secured by 35 students of 8 th class . the average of their marks was 72 . if the marks secured by reema was written as 36 instead of 86 then find the correct average marks up to two decimal places .

two trains t 1 and t 2 start simultaneously from two stations x and y respectively towards each other . if they are 70 km apart both 3 and 6 hours after start , then find the distance between the two stations .

the ages of patrick and michael are in the ratio of 3 : 5 and that of michael and monica are in the ratio of 3 : 5 . if the sum of their ages is 147 , what is the difference between the ages of patrick and monica ?
eight women can do a work in 10 days . ten men can complete the same work in 6 days . what is the ratio between the capacity of a man and a woman ?

a feed store sells two varieties of birdseed : brand a , which is 65 % millet and 35 % sunflower , and brand b , which is 40 % millet and 60 % safflower . if a customer purchases a mix of the two types of birdseed that is 50 % millet , what percent of the mix is brand a ?
a man whose speed is 4.5 kmph in still water rows to a certain upstream point and back to the starting point in a river which flows at 2.5 kmph , find his average speed for the total journey ?
in what time will a railway train 60 m long moving at the rate of 54 kmph pass a telegraph post on its way ?
15 litres of mixture contains 20 % alcohol and the rest water . if 5 litres of water be mixed with it , the percentage of alcohol in the new mixture would be ?
